import colors from'assets/theme/base/colors';import typography from'assets/theme/base/typography';import borders from'assets/theme/base/borders';var info=colors.info,inputBorderColor=colors.inputBorderColor,dark=colors.dark;var size=typography.size;var borderWidth=borders.borderWidth;var input={styleOverrides:{root:{fontSize:size.sm,color:dark.main,'&:hover:not(.Mui-disabled):before':{borderBottom:"".concat(borderWidth[1]," solid ").concat(inputBorderColor)},'&:before':{borderColor:inputBorderColor},'&:after':{borderColor:info.main}}}};export default input;
